title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Jimmy G Respect, Urban's Tire Fire and Dak Disappointment, Cowboys DC Escape with Matt Mosley
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Jimmy G Respect, Urban's Tire Fire and Dak Disappointment, Cowboys DC Escape with Matt Mosley
description:
Colin explains what most people get wrong about Jimmy Garoppolo (3:00), the biggest weakness holding back the Bills (5:00), if Urban Meyer is done with the Jags (7:00), and what Justin Herbert does better than any other young QB (9:00). Then, longtime Dallas Cowboys writer - and host of The Doomsday Podcast - Matt Mosley joins Colin to react to the team's narrow win over Washington. They look at what's wrong with Dak (13:00) why the massive contract talks don't make a lot of sense (23:00), why Matt thinks the offense looks "inefficient" and "ugly" (25:00), why Dak fails in comparison to the other top QBs (28:00), and how the rest of the season will play out (30:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
